candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (2 votes): claude_opus: Hydrogen/clean energy with extreme volatility and boom/bust cycles. Heavy retail interest and meme potential. Matches NOK retail interest pattern.; deepseek: Hydrogen fuel cell company with history of extreme volatility and retail interest. Similar to FCEL but with larger market cap and more institutional following. Currently near decade lows after growth stock correction, showing potential for green energy policy-driven mean reversion.
